EmailTemplate.description: Online Training: Classes require system access to attend
EmailTemplate.name: Training - System Access Required
EmailTemplate.subject: System Access Required for VinSolutions Online Training
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Our records indicate you have registered for one of our Virtual Training class. However, in checking your account, it appears as though you have not been set up as a user in the system yet. Unfortunately, without a VinSolutions login you are ineligible to take any of our Virtual Training classes.
If you are a user in the system, please provide me with your dealership name, VinSolutions account number and your VinSolutions User ID. If you do not have a VinSolutions User ID, please contact your dealership Admin to be set up with a User ID. Once this is done, you will be able to take classes appropriate for your user level access.
If you would like to see a demo of our product, please contact our Sales Department at (913)825-6124, and they will be happy to accommodate your needs.
Please feel free to reach out to our Virtual Training Team.
Virtual Training Team jennifer.barbosa@vinsolutions.com joi.phillips@vinsolutions.com
O: 800-980-7488
F: 913-825-6396
Support Line: Toll Free (800) 980-7488 Local (913) 825-6124 Mon-Fri 8:00am-7:00pm CST Saturday 8:00am-4:00pm CST
